sys_update_xml.payload:
trueon_desktopfalsefalse01970-01-03 00:00:00

 

To bulk update last touch dates attach the excel file to this page and then click submit. Below you can get the template for which the data needs to be in for it to be updated.  

Click here to download the template file.
